tool_description: Validates file access permissions and security constraints to ensure files can be accessed by the requesting user or system.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to check permissions for

required_permissions.description: Array of required permissions: read, write, execute, delete

user_context.description: User context to check permissions for (current user if not specified)

error_messages: Invalid permission type: Permissions must be one of [read, write, execute, delete].
User context not found: Specified user context does not exist or is not accessible.
File not found: One or more file paths do not exist.
System error: Unable to retrieve permission information due to system error.
usage: Provide file paths array and specify required permissions. Optionally set user context for permission checking.

accessible_files.description: Array of file paths that meet permission requirements

restricted_files.description: Array of file paths with insufficient permissions

permission_details.description: Array of detailed permission information for each file
